info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 19 at 10:44PM MDT until September 20 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
FFWEPZ
The National Weather Service in El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern El Paso County in western Texas... Western Hudspeth County in western Texas...
* Until 1230 AM MDT.
* At 1044 PM MDT, Thunderstorms have produced heavy rainfall across the Lower Valley. Over an inch of rain has fallen in an area between Tornillo and Acala, and storms are building back over the same area. Flash flooding is likely to affect several low water crossings along Texas Highway 20, one in the vicinity of Altos Drive. Flooding is also likely to affect the colonia near Los Altos Drive and Chubasco Drive.
HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Flash flooding of arroyos, highways, low water crossings, roads, and other poor drainage and low- lying areas.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Rural areas of the Lower Valley between Tornillo and Acala.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
